description: go.talks/present: Update URL ref to godoc.org.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.talks

https://codereview.appspot.com/8614046/diff/5001/present/doc.go
File present/doc.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/8614046/diff/5001/present/doc.go#newcode27
present/doc.go:27: http://godoc.org/code.google.com/p/go.talks/pkg/present
i don't like replacing the 'how to get it' with a link to a third-party site, fantastic though the site is.  it's a bad precedent. how about leaving it as it is and adding:
Documentation for that package is available at <godoc link>

or maybe ", with documentation available at ..."

https://codereview.appspot.com/8614046/diff/5001/present/doc.go
File present/doc.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/8614046/diff/5001/present/doc.go#newcode27
present/doc.go:27: http://godoc.org/code.google.com/p/go.talks/pkg/present
On 2013/04/17 06:33:10, r wrote:
> i don't like replacing the 'how to get it' with a link to a third-party site,
> fantastic though the site is.  it's a bad precedent. how about leaving it as it
> is and adding:
> Documentation for that package is available at <godoc link>
> 
> or maybe ", with documentation available at ..."

I am only changing the old URL for that third-party site with the new URL for the same site; adg had already set the precedent in this case.

I can change it if you want.

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/8614046/diff/5001/present/doc.go
File present/doc.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/8614046/diff/5001/present/doc.go#newcode27
present/doc.go:27: http://godoc.org/code.google.com/p/go.talks/pkg/present
ah, i see. ok. since we're all in the same repo, i guess it can stand.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=537ce02d1d20&repo=talks ***

go.talks/present: Update URL ref to godoc.org.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/8614046

subject: code review 8614046: go.talks/present: Update URL ref to godoc.org.
